Name: idol Live
About the game: 'idol Live' is an auxiliary tool for streamers that uses real-time facial capture and motion capture (coming soon) technology to drive our delicate 3D idol characters, and then the user can conduct live streaming through streaming software like 'OBS'. The software currently has a digital female character and a male character. The software will continue to support multiple 3D characters for fun. Also, the software supports 'spout2' video stream with alpha channel or you can use green screen background which can also be used to cut out the 3D character only.
Developers: Zhejiang Tuxing Zhiyu Technology Co., Ltd.
Publishers: Zhejiang Tuxing Zhiyu Technology Co., Ltd.
